Community Health Clinics: Non-profit organizations and volunteers could establish community health clinics to provide basic dental care to those in need.
Dental Insurance Alternatives: Insurance companies could offer dental care packages as part of their general health insurance plans.
Dental Education: Schools could integrate dental education into their curriculum, teaching children and young adults about proper dental care.
Crowdfunding for Dental Care: Platforms like GoFundMe could be used to crowdfund for dental procedures for those who cannot afford them.
Mobile Dental Units: Mobile dental units could be set up in areas with high demand for dental care, offering on-site dental services.
